## Phase 2: Security and Privacy Implementation

-   [ ]  Implement Emulator Veil for privacy-preserving execution
-   [ ]  Create quantum-resistant cryptography layer
-   [ ]  Build zero-knowledge proof system for data sharing
-   [ ]  Develop hardware enclave integration with TSU anomaly detection
-   [ ]  Create attack mitigation algorithms (double-execution, forking)

## Phase 3: Network and Distributed Systems

-   [ ]  Implement P2P networking with libp2p
-   [ ]  Create sharding system for compute and storage
-   [ ]  Build consensus mechanism with BFT guarantees
-   [ ]  Integrate IPFS/Tor hybrid decentralized web
-   [ ]  Develop mempool and block propagation system

## Phase 4: Gaming and Simulation Framework

-   [ ]  Create native emulator framework for retro/modern gaming
-   [ ]  Implement WASM-wrapped emulation logic
-   [ ]  Build blockchain-based multiplayer synchronization
-   [ ]  Integrate AI upscaling and modding tools
-   [ ]  Connect gaming to PoC incentive system

-   [ ]  Create "chalice economy" for sacred data flows
-   [ ]  Build integrated digital currency wallets
-   [ ]  Develop data oracles for federated learning
